document.full_text: if the containment at the nuclear power plant damaged by japan's devastating earthquake fails, a potential radiation plume from a full core meltdown could reach tokyo, a u.s. scientists' organization said on tuesday.
document.title: radiation plume could reach tokyo: u.s. scientists
lines_and_colors: if the containment at the nuclear power plant damaged by japan's devastating earthquake fails, a potential radiation plume from a full core meltdown could reach tokyo, a u.s. scientists' organization said on tuesday.
